title: Update to a new Android Studio project.
message:
Update to a new Android Studio project.

Additionally, some layout tweaks and fixes took place. HTTPS is now used
to access the API. MinSdk is now 9, TargetSdk is 25.

title: Fix the settings activity background being null.
message:
Fix the settings activity background being null.

This reverts one of the lint warning fixes.

title: Use a StringBuilder in appropriate places instead of string concatenation.
message: Use a StringBuilder in appropriate places instead of string concatenation.

title: Remove year from readme.md copyright.
message: Remove year from readme.md copyright.

title: Use a StringBuilder to concatenate text file contents from a response.
message:
Use a StringBuilder to concatenate text file contents from a response.

Greatly reduces memory allocation for large idgames response text file
contents. Large text file contents no longer crash the app when memory
is limited.

title: Use a default buffer size of 8k for BufferedInputStream.
message: Use a default buffer size of 8k for BufferedInputStream.

title: Fix RatingView layout issues in DetailsView.
message:
Fix RatingView layout issues in DetailsView.

The vote count view was not aligning below the ratings.
